title: President meets Chief of the Naval Staff
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 8 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday met Chief of the Naval Staff, Admiral Naveed Ashraf here at Aiwan-e-Sadr.
During the meeting, the professional matters pertaining to the Pakistan Navy and the defence of Pakistan came under discussion, a Presidency’s news release said.
The president on this occasion also appreciated the role of the Pakistan Navy in safeguarding the country’s maritime frontiers.
